item.creategbd.beam_reactor_helmet.toolt: A helmet capable of _Emitting_ a powerful, continuous _Laser Beam_ when activated.
Activates the reactor which fires the laser beam.
item.creategbd.guardian_beam_capacitor.t: An uncommon _Guardian_ drop that is useful in constructing sophisticated _Laser Defense Systems_.
item.creategbd.elder_guardian_beam_capac: A rare _Elder Guardian_ drop that is useful in constructing even better sophisticated _Laser Defense Systems_ as well as other useful _gadgets_.
block.creategbd.basic_laser_turret.toolt: A sophisticated _Laser Defense Unit_ that automatically _Locks_ on to a _specified_ mob should it come close.
Charges up a _Guardian Laser Beam_ aimed at a _specified_ mob at a rate based on the _Rotation Speed_.
block.creategbd.advanced_laser_turret.to: A much more advanced _Laser Defense Unit_ capable of _Locking_ on to _ten_ mobs at once.
Charges up _Guardian Laser Beams_ aimed at _specified_ mobs at a rate based on the _Rotation Speed_.
create.turret.targeting.everything: All Mobs except for the Owner
creategbd.turret.wrench_error: You are not the owner of this turret.
